description: This file defines a mock class for the omi::IOmiProxy interface, used in testing. It includes mock methods for mounting and unmounting crypted bundles and managing listeners, leveraging Google Mock framework.

classes.name: MockOmiProxy
classes.description: A mock implementation of the omi::IOmiProxy interface for testing purposes.

methods.name: mountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mock method simulating mounting of a crypted bundle with specified parameters, returning a boolean indicating success.

methods.name: umountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mock method simulating unmounting of a crypted bundle identified by its ID.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Mock method registering an event listener, returning a handle for the registration.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Mock method unregistering a previously registered event listener using its handle.

calls: MOCK_METHOD(bool, mountCryptedBundle, (const std::string& id, const std::string& rootfs_file_path, const std::string& config_json_path, std::string& bundlePath), (override))
MOCK_METHOD(long unsigned, registerListener, (const OmiErrorListener& listener, const void* cbParams), (override))
